description: This file defines the 'MatchesScreen' widget in a Flutter application, responsible for displaying profile matches with filtering options, including handling filters display, profile grid, and navigation to filter settings.

classes.name: _ActiveFilterChips
classes.description: A widget that displays currently active filters as removable chips, with options to reset or clear all filters.

classes.name: _DeletableChip
classes.description: A widget representing a filter as a Chip with a delete icon, allowing removal of individual filters.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names to human-readable labels, e.g., 'middleEastern' -> 'Middle Eastern'.

methods.name: _buildOrderedChips
methods.description: Builds a list of filter chips based on current filter criteria, enabling navigation to filter sections.
